metadata.title: CVE-2021-46022 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An Use-After-Free vulnerability in rec_mset_elem_destroy() at rec-mset.c ofGNU Recutils v1.8.90 can lead to a segmentation fault or application crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46022` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

librec1 - 1.9-3build3
recutils - 1.9-3build3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: recutils package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9-3build3').
